name: 墨色三国志Ⅱ
description:
"Three Kingdoms II" is a puzzle strategy war chess game made from the late Han Dynasty to the Three Kingdoms period in China. There are three ways to play, which are plot, world, and hegemony.

The plot is based on the plot of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" in the four famous Chinese books as a reference, and the classic plot is restored in the form of strategic war chess, in each plot, the player plays a fixed role, uses a reasonable strategy, through the plot.

The world is a reference to famous battles from the late Han to the Three Kingdoms period, combined with popular self-propelled chess gameplay, restore these famous battles, players choose generals, buy weapons, upgrade inns, through different characters, weapon combinations, defeat the enemy, and achieve the final victory.

The gameplay of hegemony is to restore the maps, forces, cities, and characters from the late Han to the Three Kingdoms period, players play a force to attack the city, reasonably develop internal affairs, recruit talents, upgrade troops, collect weapons, deal with diplomacy, reasonably match military generals to attack and defend the city, and finally unify all forces and achieve victory. The gameplay has nearly a thousand characters, hundreds of weapons, and hundreds of skills. There are also maps of different periods to choose from, with rich character pairings, diverse gameplay, and very hardcore.

Three Kingdoms II has been expanded and optimized in the first generation version, making it more strategic and richer in gameplay. With the help of some enthusiastic players, the game was finally successfully completed, and some players actually had 2000+ (hours) of game time, the author is very pleased with this, thank you very much for the support of all players, and hope that the Three Kingdoms series of games can bring happiness to more players.
